entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow changing to flurries at times heavy after midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the morning then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
